data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Bekaa to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bekaa, Lebanon
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Bekaa, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Bekaa, Lebanon. Please, stir the 751 believers here to pray for awakening.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Bekaa, Lebanon who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Kurd, Kurmanji people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 140 neighbors who are far from you in Bekaa. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Bekaa do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 751 believers in the state of Bekaa with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.
